items.name: EvCAT
items.info: Event Category, if >0:  e-, e-p, e-pi+.....

items.name: NPGP
items.info: Number of Final (Timed-based) Reconstructed Particles*100 + Number of Geometrically Reconstructed Particles

items.name: TRG
items.info: Trigger Type (CLAS12_e-, FT_CLAS12_h, CLAS12_H,...) + Prescale Factor for that Trigger

items.name: index
items.info: index of the hit in the specific detector bank

items.name: pindex
items.info: row number in the particle bank hit is associated with

items.name: detector
items.info: Detector ID, defined in COATJAVA DetectorType

items.name: path
items.info: Path from vertex to the hit position

items.name: hx
items.info: X coordinate of the matched hit

items.name: hy
items.info: Y coordinate of the mathced hit

items.name: hz
items.info: Z coordinate of the matched hit

items.name: trkId
items.info: index of the track in Tracks bank

items.name: x
items.info: x-position of the track at the detector surface

items.name: y
items.info: y-position of the track at the detector surface

items.name: z
items.info: z-position of the track at the detector surface

items.name: px
items.info: px of the track at the detector surface

items.name: py
items.info: py of the track at the detector surface

items.name: pz
items.info: pz of the track at the detector surface

items.name: pathlength
items.info: pathlength of the track to the detector surface from the DOCA point

items.name: x_unc
items.info: Global X coor unc (cm) of hit

items.name: y_unc
items.info: Global Y coor unc (cm) of hit

items.name: z_unc
items.info: Global Z coor unc (cm) of hit

items.name: tx
items.info: Global X coor (cm) of hit from DC info - trackid index

items.name: ty
items.info: Global Y coor (cm) of hit from DC info - trackid index

items.name: tz
items.info: Global Z coor (cm) of hit from DC info - trackid index

items.name: adc_idx1
items.info: index of hit with ADCL in adc bank, starts at zero

items.name: adc_idx2
items.info: index of hit with ADCR in adc bank, starts at zero

items.name: tdc_idx1
items.info: index of hit with TDCL in tdc bank, starts at zero

items.name: tdc_idx2
items.info: index of hit with TDCR in tdc bank, starts at zero

items.name: pathLength
items.info: pathlength of the track from the vertex (doca point to the beamline to the midpoint between the entrance and exit of the hit bar

items.name: pathLengthThruBar
items.info: pathlength of the track from the entrance point to the exit point through the hit bar

items.name: status
items.info: particle status (represents detector collection it passed)
